transcript.content: Good afternoon. LAMA GP surgery. How can I assist you in your emergency?
Hi, I need urgent help. I am experiencing difficulty breathing.
Can you confirm your name and date of birth for identity verification?
My name is Emily Castaneda and I was born on October 17, 1984.
Thank you, Emily Castaneda. I've located your records. Let me assist you immediately.
Please stay calm. I am arranging an ambulance for your difficulty breathing. Is there someone with you?
Good. Ensure they keep you comfortable. The ambulance will arrive shortly. Please stay on the line for any updates.
